Articles.Content: Does anyone know of any visual atmospheric mods that will work for 1.0.4? I would love to have some clouds and other visual enhancements in my game.
I think Environmental Visual Enhancements (EVE) still works but I'm not sure

> 
> I think Environmental Visual Enhancements (EVE) still works but I'm not sure

It does, i use it without astronomers Modifications to keep the game fluid.
KSPRC works fine if you update the dependencies. Last time i checked.

> 
> It does, i use it without astronomers Modifications to keep the game fluid.

I do too. 

I'll give this scatterer a try too, y'all. Thanks for the heads up.

Edit: put me past the Ram crash limit. Looked awesome though.
